programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.desc: The Panthers visit the Maple Leafs for Game 1 of an East semifinal. Florida ousted Toronto 4-1 in the 2023 second round. William Nylander (TOR) recorded nine points in the first-round win over Ottawa. Florida bumped rival Tampa Bay in five games.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.desc: The Panthers and Maple Leafs play Game 2 of an East semifinal. Toronto survived Florida's late Game 1 surge to win 5-4. Joseph Woll (TOR) made 17 stops in relief of Anthony Stolarz, who left the game after taking a Sam Bennett elbow to the head.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Toronto Maple Leafs at Florida Panthers
programme.sub-title: Toronto Maple Leafs at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The Maple Leafs, owners of a 2-0 lead, visit the Panthers for Game 3 of an East semifinal. Toronto protected home ice by repelling Florida 4-3 in Game 2 behind Joseph Woll's 25 saves. Teams leading 2-0 have won 86% of Stanley Cup playoff series.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Toronto Maple Leafs at Florida Panthers
programme.sub-title: Toronto Maple Leafs at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The Panthers try to tie up their East semifinal against the Maple Leafs, down 2-1 entering Game 4. Facing a potential 3-0 deficit in overtime, former Boston captain Brad Marchand tormented Toronto again, scoring the winning goal in Florida's 5-4 win.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.desc: The Maple Leafs host the Panthers for Game 5 of their Eastern Conference semifinal. Sergei Bobrovsky recorded his second shutout of the postseason to help Florida even the series with a 2-0 Game 4 win. Joseph Woll (TOR) stopped 35 shots in the loss.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Toronto Maple Leafs at Florida Panthers
programme.sub-title: Toronto Maple Leafs at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The Panthers try to put away the Maple Leafs in Game 6 of their East semifinal. Florida took a 3-2 series lead with a 6-1 victory. Sergei Bobrovsky (FLA) was denied a second consecutive shutout when Toronto scored with 1:06 remaining in Game 5.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.desc: The Maple Leafs try to slay their ghosts in Game 7 of the East semifinal with the Panthers. Toronto stayed alive with a resolute 2-0 Game 6 victory in Florida. Auston Matthews (TOR) broke a 0-0 tie with a third-period goal, his first of the series.
